body.p: Dr Sir. The Young Men of this place have organised a military Company and Elected among their officers John M Beville Captain. who. will be in Frankfort by the time this letter reaches you. to procure arms for the company. -- considerable interest is felt here in his success in procuring arms If possible It is hoped. that the accomodation may be extended,
True. there is another Company in the County -- but it is in extreme part bordering on Nelson Co
Your "Bank Veto" received general favor here among. "Old friends" & for new.

Very. Respectfully
Your friend
L R Thurman
